eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
g\cdot X(\sigma+2\pi,\tau) &=& e^{2\pi i k/N}g\cdot X(\sigma,\tau),\;\; \nonumber \\
g\cdot X^*(\sigma+2\pi,\tau) &=&    e^{-2\pi i k/N}g\cdot X^*(\sigma,\tau),\nonumber \\
g\cdot \psi(\sigma+2\pi,\tau) &=& - e^{2\pi i k/N}g\cdot \psi (\sigma,\tau),\;\; \nonumber \\
g\cdot \psi^*(\sigma+2\pi,\tau) &=&   - e^{-2\pi i k/N}g\cdot \psi^*(\sigma,\tau).
\

\begin{eqnarray}  \alpha^*_{-a} |0 \rangle :\; E_0^L =& (3a-1)/2, \; {\rm for} \;  &0<a<\half \nonumber \\     
                                    =& {a}/{2}, \;\;\; {\rm for} \; & \half<a<1 \nonumber \\ 
 \alpha_{-(1-a)}|0 \rangle : \; E_0^L =&  (1-a)/, \; {\rm for} \; & 0<a<\half \nonumber \\     
                                    =&  {(2-3a)}/{2}, \; {\rm for} \; & \half<a<1  .
                                    \
